creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
description: Frontal portrait of American Indian woman covered in furs; she wears a feather near the top part of her head and a long braid over her PR shoulder; rolling hills in background; colorful sky overhead
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 1986.
signed: Signed and dated in colored pencil on shoulder of figure: 10-85 Frank Big Bear, Jr.
title: Gall
